riddle: What number becomes zero when you subtract 15 from half of it?
I am a three-digit number. My tens digit is five more than my ones digit, and my hundreds digit is eight less than my tens digit. What am I?
I am a number. Multiply me by 2 and subtract 6, you get 10. What am I?
A farmer has 17 sheep. All but 9 run away. How many does he have left?
I am a two-digit number. My ones digit is three times my tens digit. What am I?
If you divide 30 by half and add 10, what do you get?
I am an odd number. Take away one letter and I become even. What number am I?
I am a number that when multiplied by itself and then subtracted from twice itself gives you 2. What am I?
You have 10 apples. You give away 3 and then take back 2. How many apples do you have now?
I am a number. If you multiply me by 4 and subtract 6, you get 18. What am I?
I am a three-digit number. My ones and tens digit add up to 10. If you subtract my tens digit from my ones digit, you get 2. What am I?
I am a number. Double me and subtract 5, and you get 15. What am I?
If 3 cats can catch 3 mice in 3 minutes, how long will it take 100 cats to catch 100 mice?
I am a number. When you multiply me by myself, you get 49. What am I?
The ages of a father and son add up to 66. The father’s age is the son’s age reversed. How old are they?
A clock strikes six in 5 seconds. How long will it take to strike twelve?
I am a number. Divide me by 3 and add 4, you get 9. What am I?
You have 4 chocolate bars. You eat 3. How many do you have?
I am a number. If you subtract me from twice myself, you get 9. What am I?
I am a two-digit number. My ones digit is double my tens digit. What am I?
Which number is spelled in alphabetical order?
What 3 positive numbers give the same answer when multiplied and added together?
I am a number. When you add me to myself, then divide by myself, you get 2. What am I?
I am a number. Multiply me by 3, subtract 4, then divide by 2, and you get 5. What am I?
What is the smallest two-digit prime number?
I am a number. If you subtract my ones digit from my tens digit, you get 3. If you multiply my digits together, you get 18. What am I?
A rectangle has a length that is twice its width. If its area is 50 square units, what is its length?
I am a number. If you divide me by 5 and add 7, you get 15. What am I?
I am a number. If you add 7 to me and divide by 2, you get 9. What am I?
